headline.main: PRESIDENT IS TOLD SHIP BAN WILL END; Confers With Congress Chiefs -- Mrs. Caraway Calls for Repeal, Wheeler Denounces It

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Nov. 5 -- Administration leaders in Congress told President Roosevelt today that they thought both houses would authorize him within the next few days to arm American merchant ships and send them anywhere in the world.
abstract: Sen debate; Sens Wheeler, Johnson, Walsh and others s; Sen Downey cites Gallup poll; Adm leaders conf with Roosevelt
snippet: WASHINGTON, Nov. 5 -- Administration leaders in Congress told President Roosevelt today that they thought both houses would authorize him within the next few days to arm American merchant ships and send them anywhere in the world....
